Author: Rivka90
Text: I feel you. I lost a lot and regained it all in less than a month. I am back right where I started but it's okay. I know that I did it before and I can do it again, and I think about how much I must've really needed that time to eat and just let myself go through it. It was a breakup that fucked me up, too. But I am back now and what's done is done. You can do this. Message me if you want ðŸ˜Š

Author: so_crat_ic
Text: Give yourself some time. I fucked up again, but at the gym right now. Only had 500 calories today. Well ok I fucked up 3 days ina row. but if youre in the mood, dont let it go to waste. Take as long as you need. Emotional eating happens. You can start again when you are ready. Gotta be healthy about it.
